privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Apartmani Jovča respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Serbia.

s1.title: 1. What Data We Collect
s1.content: When making a reservation and during your stay at our apartments, we collect the following data:
s1.item1: Personal data: Full name, phone number, email address
s1.item2: Identification data: ID card or passport number (legally required for guest registration)
s1.item3: Reservation data: Stay dates, number of guests, selected apartment
s1.item4: Financial data: Payment and deposit information
s1.item5: Communication: Correspondence via email, WhatsApp, or phone

s2.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
s2.content: We use your personal data exclusively for the following purposes:
s2.item3: Communication about your stay, arrival instructions, and additional services

s3.title: 3. Data Protection
s3.content: We implement strict measures to protect your personal data:
s3.item1: Data is stored on secure servers with encryption
s3.item2: Only authorized personnel (owner and administrators) have access to data
s3.item3: We do not share your data with third parties except when legally required (police, tourism inspection)

s5.title: 5. Your Rights
s5.content: In accordance with data protection laws, you have the right to:
s5.item1: Request access to your personal data that we store
s5.item3: Request deletion of data after the legal retention period expires
s5.item4: Withdraw consent for data processing (except legally required)

s6.title: 6. Data Retention Period
s6.content: We store your data in accordance with legal obligations: guest registration data is kept for 1 year, financial data for 5 years, and other data is deleted 2 years after your last stay.

contact.content: For all questions about the protection of your personal data, you can contact us:

terms.title: Terms of Service & House Rules
terms.intro: By making a reservation and staying at Apartmani Jovča, you accept the following terms of service and house rules. Please read these rules carefully to ensure a pleasant stay without misunderstandings.

s1.title: 1. Reservation and Confirmation
s1.item1: A reservation is considered valid only after our written confirmation via email or WhatsApp
s1.item2: A deposit of €50 is required to confirm the reservation and will be refunded after property inspection upon departure
s1.item3: Full payment must be made no later than 7 days before arrival or upon arrival (cash or bank transfer)
s1.item4: The reservation binds both parties - guest and owner - to respect the agreed terms

s2.title: 2. Check-in and Check-out
s2.item1: Check-in: from 2:00 PM. Early check-in possible with prior notice and availability (€10/hour surcharge)
s2.item2: Check-out: by 10:00 AM. Late check-out possible with prior notice and availability (€10/hour surcharge)
s2.item3: Guest registration is legally mandatory - a valid ID (ID card or passport) is required for all guests

s3.title: 3. Cancellation Policy
s3.item1: Cancellation more than 14 days before arrival: 100% refund of paid amount (except €30 deposit)
s3.item2: Cancellation 7-14 days before arrival: 50% refund of paid amount
s3.item3: Cancellation less than 7 days before arrival: no refund (100% charge)

s4.title: 4. House Rules - Basic Rules
s4.content: Behavior rules in the property for a pleasant stay for all guests:
s4.item1: Quiet hours: 10:00 PM - 8:00 AM. Loud music, shouting, and noise are strictly prohibited. Violation may result in termination of stay without refund.
s4.item2: Maximum number of guests: according to apartment capacity. Additional guests are not allowed without prior notice and surcharge (€20/person/night).
s4.item3: Smoking is strictly prohibited indoors. Allowed only on designated terrace. Penalty for indoor smoking: €100.
s4.item4: Pets are allowed with prior notice and a surcharge of €15/day. Owner is responsible for behavior and cleanliness.

s5.title: 5. Prohibitions and Safety
s5.item1: Organizing parties, celebrations, or gatherings with more than 2 additional unregistered guests. Penalty: €200.
s5.item2: Removing inventory (towels, linens, kitchen appliances) from the property. Penalty: compensation at market value.
s5.item3: Any use of the premises for illegal activities (drugs, prostitution) will be reported to police and result in immediate contract termination.

s6.title: 6. Damage and Liability
s6.content: Any intentional or negligent damage to inventory or property will be charged at the actual repair or replacement cost. The €50 deposit serves as a guarantee and will be refunded within 24 hours after property inspection.

s7.title: 7. Additional Obligations
s7.content: Guests are required to: leave the property tidy, dispose of trash in designated containers, turn off all devices (AC, heating, lights) upon departure. For exceptionally dirty premises, additional cleaning of €30 will be charged. Loss of key carries a €50 penalty.
